newsitem.title: USA: PRESS DIGEST - Washington Post business - April 1.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Washington Post business - April 1.

text.p: The Washington Post carried the following major business stories on Tuesday:
WASHINGTON - Black Entertainment Television and Chevy Chase Bank announced they were teaming up to sell financial services nationwide to African Americans.
PARIS - Europe's decade-long airline deregulation process, which will be complete Tuesday, is a qualified success.

WASHINGTON - Nearly two-thirds of the drivers involved in crashes examined in a recent study suffered some kind of air-bag related injury, according to the University of Michigan's Transportation Research Institute.
WASHINGTON - The United States alleged that Japan and 45 other nations have erected harmful trade barriers that are costing U.S. businesses and farmers billions of dollars of lost sales annually.
